Daily Interaction-Design

For one month starting from 26.11.2019 I am challenging myself to create a piece of interaction design every day (german holidays and weekends excluded ;) ). This shall range from button-design to new chat-interfaces... all code is documented on this github-repo:https://github.com/bjoerndot/dailyIXD
